project (libheif-dependency)

#Example:
#cmake .. -DEXTERNALS_DOWNLOAD_DIR=/dev2/d -DINSTALL_ROOT=/dev2/i

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)
include(ExternalProject)

if(NOT IS_DIRECTORY ${EXTERNALS_DOWNLOAD_DIR})
    message(FATAL_ERROR "No externals download dir set. Use -DEXTERNALS_DOWNLOAD_DIR")
endif()

if(NOT IS_DIRECTORY ${INSTALL_ROOT})
    message(FATAL_ERROR "No install dir set. Use -DINSTALL_ROOT")
endif()

set(TOP_INST_DIR ${INSTALL_ROOT})
set(EXTPREFIX "${TOP_INST_DIR}")
set(CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH "${EXTPREFIX}")

SET(EXTPREFIX_heif "${EXTPREFIX}" )

ExternalProject_Add(
    ext_openjpeg
    DOWNLOAD_DIR ${EXTERNALS_DOWNLOAD_DIR}

    URL https://github.com/uclouvain/openjpeg/archive/refs/tags/v2.5.4.tar.gz
    URL_HASH SHA256=a695fbe19c0165f295a8531b1e4e855cd94d0875d2f88ec4b61080677e27188a
    DOWNLOAD_EXTRACT_TIMESTAMP FALSE

    CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${EXTPREFIX_heif} -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DBUILD_STATIC_LIBS=OFF -DBUILD_CODEC=OFF

    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
)

ExternalProject_Add(
    ext_libde265
    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/strukturag/libde265.git
    GIT_SHALLOW TRUE

    CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${EXTPREFIX_heif} -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DENABLE_DECODER=OFF -DENABLE_ENCODER=OFF -DENABLE_SDL=OFF

    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
)

ExternalProject_Add(
    ext_libheif
    DOWNLOAD_DIR ${EXTERNALS_DOWNLOAD_DIR}

    URL https://github.com/strukturag/libheif/releases/download/v1.20.2/libheif-1.20.2.tar.gz
    URL_HASH SHA256=68ac9084243004e0ef3633f184eeae85d615fe7e4444373a0a21cebccae9d12a
    DOWNLOAD_EXTRACT_TIMESTAMP FALSE
#    GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/strukturag/libheif.git
#    GIT_SHALLOW TRUE

    CMAKE_ARGS -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${EXTPREFIX_heif} -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DENABLE_PLUGIN_LOADING=OFF -DWITH_AOM_DECODER=OFF -DWITH_AOM_ENCODER=OFF -DWITH_DAV1D=OFF -DWITH_LIBDE265=ON -DWITH_RAV1E=OFF -DWITH_X265=OFF -DWITH_SvtEnc=OFF -DWITH_OpenJPEG_DECODER=ON -DWITH_OpenJPEG_ENCODER=ON -DWITH_OpenH264_DECODER=ON -DWITH_EXAMPLES=OFF -DWITH_EXAMPLE_HEIF_VIEW=OFF -DWITH_GDK_PIXBUF=OFF -DWITH_LIBSHARPYUV=OFF

    UPDATE_COMMAND ""
    DEPENDS ext_openjpeg ext_libde265
)
